localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Exashape is an app that allows you to challenge your own memory. It has a minimal interface with a single focus: "challenging your memory".
blogPost.body: Exashape is an app that allows you to challenge your own memory. It has a minimal interface with a single focus: "challenging your memory".
blogPost.title: Exashape - A minimalist game to challenge your own memory
blogPost.author: Kadir İnip

localize.description: Exashape是一款让你挑战自己记忆力的应用。它的界面极简，只有一个重点："挑战你的记忆力"。
localize.tagline: 一款挑战自己记忆力的极简主义游戏

localize.description: Exashape是一款讓你挑戰自己記憶力的應用。它的界面極簡，只有一個重點："挑戰你的記憶力"。
localize.tagline: 一款挑戰自己記憶力的極簡主義遊戲

previous.excerpt: It's hard to focus when you're stuck at home. 5am coder brings programmers, developers & makers together at 5am for session of deep, focused work.
previous.title: 5am Coder - Wake up and code alongside developers & makers

localize.description: 当你被困在家里的时候，很难集中精力。5am coder让程序员、开发者和制造者在凌晨5点聚集在一起，进行深入、专注的工作。
localize.tagline: 醒来后与开发者和制造者一起编写代码

localize.description: 當你被困在家裏的時候，很難集中精力。5am coder讓程序員、開發者和製造者在凌晨5點聚集在一起，進行深入、專注的工作。
localize.tagline: 醒來後與開發者和製造者一起編寫代碼

next.excerpt: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
next.title: Suez Canal Blockage - See how much it costs & guess when the blockage is over

localize.description: 一个周末的小项目，可视化的Ever Given货船堵塞苏伊士运河的估计成本。有一个愚蠢的功能，你可以猜测什么时候堵塞会结束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少钱&猜猜看什么时候堵完了

localize.description: 一個週末的小項目，可視化的Ever Given貨船堵塞蘇伊士運河的估計成本。有一個愚蠢的功能，你可以猜測什麼時候堵塞會結束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少錢&猜猜看什麼時候堵完了
